notes.note: [[Job Application]] drops from [[Dr Defecaus]]
Purchase Sculpting Tools from the town shop. This quest is not account-wide.
If you've accidentally sold the {{CraftReq|Crimson String}}, you can reclaim it from the quest codex.
Map 2 is the third Grasslands zone, [[Worlds#G3 - Froggy Fields|Froggy Fields]].
Crafting the required items before accepting the quest will not reward the player with completion progress.
There are '''TWO''' {{CraftReq|Golden Jam}} items. You want the {{CraftReq|Golden Jam (Quest)}} item for this.
[[Stiltzcho]] rewards you with the report upon completing his first 3 quests.
The 'Forest Camp' is the second area of the forest, where you can find the entrance to the [[Amarok]] boss fight.

[[Amarok|The boss]] is located to the far right in [[Worlds#F2 - Encroaching Forest Villas|Encroaching Forest Villas]]. You need to complete [[Dog Bone (NPC)|Dog Bone]]'s quest to get the keys required to enter the [[Amarok|boss]] zone.

The Scripticus gives you all the 3 recipes for the tokens and also the 3 recipes which are needed to craft the [[Blunderhills NPC Completion Token]] ([[Easy Blunderhills NPC Token|Easy]], [[Med Blunderhills NPC Token|Med]], [[Hard Blunderhills NPC Token|Hard]])
You unlock a bridge at the top of the screen next to the portal that connects directly to the gold ores.
Daily Quest
Daily Quest. The first time you start this quest, the recipe for the Peanut drops.
Daily Quest. You must complete this quest for the 'Escapin' the 'Laws' daily [[Tasks|Task]].
Daily Quest. There is a [[Sandy Pot]] at [[Carrotman|Carrotmen]]. Kill it, pick up the teacup and run back to Picnic Stowaway.
Daily Quest
Daily Quest
Daily Quest. Nuget Cakes drop from [[Crabcake|Crabcakes]]
Daily Quest
Recipe drops from this NPC before quest.
Requires level 7 choppin to start this quest.
The Stamp Thief is Hamish found at the bottom right of the frogs area
This quest can also be completed if you're a journeyman.
[[Baba Yaga]] spawns at the top of each hour (xx:00) in the Birch Grove (portal just below Promotheus, next to the Birch Tree). See the [[Baba Yaga]] page for more information.
[[Baba Yaga]] spawns at the top of each hour (xx:00) in the Birch Grove (portal just below Promotheus, next to the Birch Tree). See the [[Baba Yaga]] page for more information.
Get this quest by dropping a {{CraftReq|Peanut}} on the bush in Vegetable Patch.
Drop the {{CraftReq|Stone Peanut}} at the [[Rocklyte]] to start the final part of the questline.
Drop the {{CraftReq|Stone Peanut}} at the rock on the bottom right side of Froggy Fields
This quest gives the recipe for Golden Peanut
This quest can only be completed by a beginner (no class chosen)
Get this quest by dropping a {{CraftReq|Bag o Nuts}} on the cactus in Djonnuttown.
You need at least 594 defense to take 0 damage from Biggie Hours. Defeating him outside the colosseum using Googley Eyes also grants quest completion.
AFK at the [[Green Mushroom]] map for a total of 4 hours. The time spent AFK does not have to be all in one go.
The time spent AFK does not have to be all in one go.
The time spent AFK does not have to be all in one go.
The [[Peanut]] recipe comes from [[Picnic Stowaway]].
Kill the 35 spawned monsters. If you left the area before killing all 35 monsters, forfeit and re-accept the quest to spawn them again.
Drop the quest item in front of [[Krunk]], [[Funguy]] and [[Mr Pigibank]]
Need level 21
This quest can also be completed if you're a journeyman.
A [[Barbarian]] with the Worming Undercover talent makes this quest easy. Non-Barbarians should equip Fishing boost food.

Load up your inventory with the necessary materials before accepting the quest, then craft the bullets and turn the quest in. If you open your storage while the quest is active, forfeit and start over.
Reclaim the [[Crimson String]] from your codex to craft a new pair of [[Boxing Gloves]]. Forfeit and start over if you need to respawn the monster.
The recipe for Icing Ironbite comes from [[Tasks]]. Average Mana Potions are dropped by Forest monsters and [[Amarok]].
Kill 10k [[Moonmoon|Moonmoons]] and gather 1 [[Ghost]] drop. Moonmoons killed/Ghosts collected before you start this quest do not count.
These are all monster drops from World 3.
You need to have the [[Cowbo Jones]] quest 'Commence Criminal Crimes!' active in order to get this quest.
'Hoopsies' refers to the [[Catching]] minigame. You may need to complete both objectives to clear this quest.
The paintings drop from [[Mimic|Mimics]], [[Mafioso|Mafiosos]] and [[Sand Castle|Sand Castles]].

While you have this quest active and have the [[Alchemy#Level_up_Gift|Level Up Gift Alchemy Bubble]] equipped, [[Pre Crime Box|Pre Crime Boxes]] may drop. They don't do anything, you can safely sell them.
requires approximately 150 defense and 900 hp
'Light Blue' means level 5.
See [[King Doot]] for details on summoning this secret boss.
See [[Secrets]] for more information.
It has to be typed exactly like Wellington says, cAsE sEnSiTiVe. If you're not using a US Keyboard layout, Shift+1 is how you must type the exclamation point. Requires level 70.
Number of drop, not the total quantity of item. Coins also count. Spaces do NOT count.
After completing this quest, Dazey will be replaced by Sprout.
After 10 active kills, the quest auto-completes.
Bubbles unlocked before you start this quest count, but the [[Distilled Water]] must be purchased while the quest is active.
Vials unlocked before you start the quest count. See [[Alchemy#Vials|Alchemy Vials]] for a full list of unlockable Vials.
The criminal is located through the portal below Mimics.
You have to complete [[Bandit Bob|Bandit Bob's]] questline for this.
You have to complete [[Goldric|Goldric's]] questline for this.
Donate in the [[Alchemy]] Liquids Tab.
[[Carpetiem]] (in the [[Mashed Potato]] area) is the geezer you must help.
All the required recipes are given at the start of this quest.
The numbers are how many seconds you must have remaining for each colosseum.
The constellation is on the same map as the telescope, you need to afk 1h in order to complete it
All enemies can drop the letters. Daily quest
Consume 5 {{CraftReq|Lovey Dovey Letter}} to summon a [[Valentslime]]. Daily quest.
